Package clientSide.gui

Class BookingScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.controllers.AbstractScreen
      • clientSide.gui.BookingScreenController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stateful
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BookingEditingScreenController
    public class BookingScreenController
extends AbstractScreen
implements Stateful
    This class is a controller class for the booking reservations process. It includes all the functionality for getting a new booking details, validating them and sending, if necessary, to the booking logic controller for database operations.

        public void saveState()
